patterns: What kinds of items are there?
Can you tell me about the items you offer?
responses: We sell clothes for men, women, and kids.
We have a wide variety of clothing for men, women, and kids.
Our store offers clothing for all ages: men, women, and kids.

patterns: Can you show me men's jackets?
What sizes are available for dresses?
Are there any discounts on pants?
responses: Yes, we offer a variety of shirts, jeans, and jackets. Would you like to see our collection?
We have a wide selection of jeans. What size are you looking for?
Yes, we have men’s jackets available in different sizes and colors. Would you like to check them out?
Our dresses come in various sizes. Would you like help finding your size?
We currently have discounts on selected pants. Would you like to explore them?

patterns: What is the status of my order?
responses: To check your order status, please contact us.
You can track your order through the 'My Orders' section on our website.

patterns: How do I exchange a product?
responses: We accept returns within 10 days of purchase.
Our return policy allows returns within 10 days, as long as the item is in unused condition.
For exchanges, please contact our support team within 10 days of receiving your item.
We offer refunds for eligible returns within 10 days.

patterns: Can I order from outside the country?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer international shipping at this time.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
How can I pay for my order?
responses: Unfortunately, we only accept cash on delivery payments.
Currently, we only offer cash on delivery as a payment method.
We only accept payment by cash on delivery for now.

patterns: When will my order be delivered?
How soon can I expect my delivery?
When do I receive my shipment?
responses: Delivery typically takes 2-4 business days.
Shipping usually takes between 2 to 4 days.
You can expect your delivery within 2 to 4 days.
We aim to deliver within 2-4 days, depending on your location.
